00055 /*
00056  * Check for the file existance
00057  */
00058 bool CGRCFileData::Exists()
00059 {
00060         // Find the file stats.
00061         struct stat st;
00062         return (stat(m_strFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00063 }

00066 
00067 /*
00068  * Read the file contents, either pre-release or release format.
00069  */
00070 bool CGRCFileData::Read(GridControlData &grid)
00071 {
00072         grid.Clear();
00073         if (IsReleaseFormat() == true)
00074                 return ReadReleaseFormat(grid);
00075         else
00076                 return ReadPreReleaseFormat(grid);
00077 }
00078 
00080 
00081 /*
00082  * Checks the version and magic numbers for release values
00083  */
00084 bool CGRCFileData::IsReleaseFormat()
00085 {
00086         // Read the version and magic
00087         ifstream grc(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00088         uint8_t ver=0;
00089         uint8_t magic=0;
00090         ReadUInt8(grc, magic);
00091         ReadUInt8(grc, ver);
00092         grc.close();
00093         return (ver == GRC_VERSION && magic == GRC_MAGIC);
00094 }
00095 
00097 
00098 /*
00099  * Read the older pre-release (early access software) GRC file
00100  */
00101 bool CGRCFileData::ReadPreReleaseFormat(GridControlData &grid)
00102 {
00103         // Open the grc file.
00104         ifstream grc(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00105         if (!grc)
00106         {
00107                 return false;
00108         }
00109 
00110         // Read the counts.
00111         int32_t i32val;
00112         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00113         grid.SetColumns(i32val);
00114         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00115         grid.SetRows(i32val);
00116         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00117         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00118         grid.ResizeB2(i32val);
00119         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00120         grid.ResizeB1(i32val);
00121         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00122         grid.ResizeNS(i32val);
00123         ReadInt32_I(grc, i32val);
00124         m_Version = 0;
00125 
00126         // Read the unused data.
00127         int i;
00128         int16_t sval;
00129         int lChipSize = grid.GetColumns() * grid.GetRows();
00130         for (i=0; i<lChipSize; i++)
00131                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00132         for (i=0; i<lChipSize; i++)
00133                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00134         for (i=0; i<lChipSize; i++)
00135         {
00136                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00137                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00138         }
00139 
00140         // Read the coordinates.
00141         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00142         int n = grid.GetNumB2Probes();
00143         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00144         {
00145                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00146                 coord.x = sval;
00147                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00148                 coord.y = sval;
00149                 grid.SetB2(i, coord);
00150         }
00151         n = grid.GetNumB1Probes();
00152         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00153         {
00154                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00155                 coord.x = sval;
00156                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00157                 coord.y = sval;
00158                 grid.SetB1(i, coord);
00159         }
00160         n = grid.GetNumNSProbes();
00161         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00162         {
00163                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00164                 coord.x = sval;
00165                 ReadInt16_I(grc, sval);
00166                 coord.y = sval;
00167                 grid.SetNS(i, coord);
00168         }
00169 
00170         // Close and return status.
00171         grc.close();
00172         return (grc.fail() == 0);
00173 }
00174

00177 /*
00178  * Read the release format GRC file
00179  */
00180 bool CGRCFileData::ReadReleaseFormat(GridControlData &grid)
00181 {
00182         // Open the grc file.
00183         ifstream grc(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00184         if (!grc)
00185         {
00186                 return false;
00187         }
00188 
00189         // Read the magic/version
00190         uint8_t ver=0;
00191         uint8_t magic=0;
00192         ReadUInt8(grc, magic);
00193         ReadUInt8(grc, ver);
00194         m_Version = ver;
00195 
00196         // Read the counts.
00197         int32_t ival;
00198         ReadInt32_N(grc, ival);
00199         grid.SetColumns(ival);
00200         ReadInt32_N(grc, ival);
00201         grid.SetRows(ival);
00202         ReadInt32_N(grc, ival);
00203         grid.ResizeB2(ival);
00204         ReadInt32_N(grc, ival);
00205         grid.ResizeB1(ival);
00206         ReadInt32_N(grc, ival);
00207         grid.ResizeNS(ival);
00208 
00209         // Read the coordinates.
00210         FeatureCoordinate coord;
00211         uint16_t sval;
00212         int n = grid.GetNumB2Probes();
00213         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00214         {
00215                 ReadUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00216                 coord.x = sval;
00217                 ReadUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00218                 coord.y = sval;
00219                 grid.SetB2(i, coord);
00220         }
00221         n = grid.GetNumB1Probes();
00222         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00223         {
00224                 ReadUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00225                 coord.x = sval;
00226                 ReadUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00227                 coord.y = sval;
00228                 grid.SetB1(i, coord);
00229         }
00230         n = grid.GetNumNSProbes();
00231         for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00232         {
00233                 ReadUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00234                 coord.x = sval;
00235                 ReadUInt16_N(grc, sval);
00236                 coord.y = sval;
00237                 grid.SetNS(i, coord);
00238         }
00239 
00240         // Close and return status.
00241         grc.close();
00242         return (grc.fail() == 0);
00243 }
